name: San Francisco Tenants Union
description: The SFTU is a direct action group that advocates utilizing buildings and underused real estate for homeless housing and it operates a self-help, drop-in counseling clinic.
fullDescription: The SFTU is a direct action group that advocates utilizing buildings and underused real estate for homeless housing and it operates a self-help, drop-in counseling clinic.
whatTheyOffer: The SFTU is a direct action group that advocates utilizing buildings and underused real estate for homeless housing and it operates a self-help, drop-in counseling clinic.
